user_info: I'm a test user for the Rust IRC crate.

options.help: *help*: Prints this info. *ping*: See if the bot is active. *echo* _<message>_: Send a message as the bot. *info*: Displays info about the bot. *time*: Displays the current time. *quoteme*: Displays a randomly chose quote. *stop* _<password>_: Stops the bot.
